headline: Guyana Won’t Ask Exxon to Renegotiate Contract, President Says
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Guyana’s President Irfaan Ali on Tuesday firmly ruled out formally asking Exxon Mobil Corp. to renegotiate its production contract, resisting calls from his political opposition and activists in the country.
